omnideconv 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    • omnideconv_vignette

Reference

Main package methods

Main methods to build signature matrices and deconvolute cell fractions.

deconvolution_methods

List of supported immune deconvolution methods

build_model()

Building the signature matrix

deconvolute()

Deconvolution

Signature matrix creation methods

Direct access to the individual signature matrix creation methods.

build_model_momf()

Calculates the signature model with MOMF

build_model_dwls()

Signature matrix creation with DWLS using genes identified by de_analysis_mast()

build_model_scaden()

Builds Scaden Model from scRNA data

build_model_bisque()

Calculates the signature model with bisque

build_model_cibersortx()

Signature matrix creation with CibersortX

Deconvolution methods

Direct access to the individual deconvolution methods to access special features that are not available through deconvolute.

deconvolute_momf()

Deconvolution Analysis using MOMF (via Nonnegative Factorization)

deconvolute_dwls()

Calculates the decomposition using the dwls algorithm

deconvolute_scaden()

Performs deconvolution

deconvolute_bisque()

Calculates the decomposition using the bisque algorithm

deconvolute_cibersortx()

Deconvolute with CibersortX

Environment

Methods needed to set credentials or change variables in the environment.

set_cibersortx_credentials()

Setting the CibersortX Credentials

Datasets

List of datasets provided by the package.

bulk

Example RNA-seq dataset from Hoek et al.

bulk_small

Small example RNA-seq dataset from Hoek et al.

cell_type_annotations

Cell type annotations for the example single-cell RNA-seq dataset from Maynard et al.

cell_type_annotations_small

Cell type annotations for the small example single-cell RNA-seq dataset from Maynard et al.

single_cell_data

Example sigle-cell RNA-seq dataset from Maynard et al.

single_cell_data_small

Small example sigle-cell RNA-seq dataset from Maynard et al.

Visualisation

Methods which produce plots with different methods.

makeBenchmarkingScatterplot()

Make a Scatterplot for Benchmarking

plotDeconvResult()

Plot deconvolution results as a barplot

Contents

Developed by Konstantin Pelz, Nicolas Goedert, Yuyu Liang, Katharina Reinisch.
